title: The Writer's Almanac - Wednesday, November 24, 2021
description: “I am a teller of stories. For me, that’s the only way I can make sense of the world.”-- Arundhati Roy, Indian author and political activist born on this day in 1961.
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
itunes:subtitle: “I am a teller of stories. For me, that’s the only way I can make sense of the world.”-- Arundhati Roy, Indian author and political activist born on this day in 1961.
